name: We are Flowers: Catrina "I am UNIQUE"

metadata.name: I am Unique
metadata.description:
Catrinas are a representation of our traditions from Dia de Muertos in Mexico, where we honor and revisit our loved ones that have passed away. They're always in our hearts.

As part of the “We are Flowers” Collection, I wanted to celebrate this tradition with a special “We are Flowers: Catrina” Edition.

"I am UNIQUE" embodies our magic and inner strength that transcends beyond our lives and unites us through traditions and unique moments full of hope and love. She brings us comfort and peace of mind by remembering our loved ones who are no longer with us.

We are strong.  
We are resilient.  
We are beautiful.

We are Flowers.

16/16 editions. The digital portrait is a collaboration between Luci Obregon photograph & AI.

License: Can be used to display privately, in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works.
